title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 170.5 - Allocation of Empire State film production tax credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 170.5 - Allocation of Empire State film production tax credit

State Regulations

The amount of the credits given for each allocation year
shall be allocated in order of priority based upon issuance of tax credit
certificates. In the event that an approved applicant's Empire State film
production tax credit would exceed the maximum amount of credits allowed for
that given year, the approved applicant's credit will be allocated on a
priority basis in the immediately succeeding allocation year. Notes

New

York State Register December 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
